summary.title: Summary

summary: The post by Omega Seiki Mobility highlights their visionary founder and chairman, Mr. Uday Narang, who graced a prestigious manufacturing event. The post likely includes details about the event, Mr. Narang's contributions, and the company's achievements.

Uday Narang is the Founder of Omega Seiki Pvt. Ltd. He has been instrumental in the growth and expansion of the Anglian Omega Group, which includes Omega Bright Steel, one of India's largest Bright Bar steel manufacturing companies, and Yashdeep Automotive, a leading manufacturer of high-quality machine components for engines and power-trains. Narang is actively expanding the Asian and ASEAN markets in Automotive Parts, Steel, and Infrastructure projects. With over 15 years of industry experience, he has a deep understanding of company operations and broader industry trends.

The Franchise India Expo 2025 will be held on 17 and 18 May 2025 at the India International Convention and Expo Centre, Delhi, India. The event includes various segments such as Exhibition, Startup Summit, Awards, and multiple pavilions including Dealer India Pavilion, Brand Licensing Pavilion, Startup India Pavilion, India EV & Auto Pavilion, Food & Restaurant Pavilion, International Pavilion, Franchise Pavilion, Retail Real Estate, and E-commerce & D2C Pavilion. Registration and information download options are available for exhibitors, awards, and conference attendees.

The Franchise India Expo 2025 offers opportunities to attend, exhibit, sponsor, and nominate for awards. The event includes various pavilions and categories such as Dealer India Pavilion, Brand Licensing Pavilion, Startup India Pavilion, India EV & Auto Pavilion, Food & Restaurant Pavilion, International Pavilion, Franchise Pavilion, Retail Real Estate, and E-commerce & D2C Pavilion. Registration options are available for exhibitions, awards, conferences, and sponsorships. Previous winners and media coverage are also highlighted.

The page is about the EV India Show, featuring information on the conference, exhibition, awards, and sponsorship. It includes details about the speakers, such as Uday Narang, who is the Founder & Chairman of Omega Seiki Mobility. The page also provides links to various sections like agenda, registration, and speaker details.

The content discusses Uday Narang's post about the EV Manufacturing Show and Excellence Awards 2023. The event featured key leaders in the EV value chain, covering current manufacturing scenarios, supply chain challenges, innovations, and new tools for vehicle design. Uday Narang, Founder at Omega Seiki Mobility, received the Business Leadership Award for Outstanding Contribution to EV Manufacturing. He dedicated the award to his team and thanked key individuals for their contributions. The post includes comments from various professionals congratulating Uday Narang and his team.
